conversation.content: Namaste! Main Triotech ki Sales Assistant hoon.  Main aapki kis tarah help kar sakti hoon?
mujko ringigo ke bare me batao
Ji haan, bilkul!  Let me tell you about Ringigo.

Ji, mujhe maf karna, Ringigo ke bare mein mere paas currently information nahin hai.  Lekin hum Triotech mein bahut saare AI-based products dete hain.  Aapko kis type ka solution chahiye?  Shayad main aapko kuch aur suggest kar saku.

Okay,  "Ringigo"  se aap shayad  "JustCall" ko refer kar rahe hain?  We don't have a product named "Ringigo".  Is it possible you meant "JustCall"?

If so, let me use our internal knowledge base to give you more details.

{   "products": [     {       "name": "Justtawk",       "desc": "AI Virtual Call Center integrating intelligent voice bots, real-time analytics and automation.",       "target": "SMBs, BPOs, Enterprises"     },     {       "name": "Convoze",       "desc": "AI Speech Analyzer for real-time speech analysis, sentiment detection and topic insights.",       "target": "Call centers, support teams"     },     {       "name": "Xeny",       "desc": "Conversational AI Voice Bot with real-time talk-back and intelligent responses.",       "target": "Customer engagement, onboarding"     },     {       "name": "Fohrce",       "desc": "AI-powered HRMS automating HR tasks and providing intelligent insights.",       "target": "HR, payroll, workforce management"     },     {       "name": "Ringingo",       "desc": "AI Dialer with automated call handling, smart routing, and real-time metrics.",       "target": "Sales teams, telemarketing"     },     {       "name": "AI Chat Bot",       "desc": "Text-based conversational assistant with topic detection and sentiment analysis.",       "target": "Web support, FAQs"     },     {       "name": "AI LMS",       "desc": "Personalized learning and upskilling platform with career roadmaps.",       "target": "Training, education, enterprises"     }   ],   "faqs": [     {       "q": "Do you integrate with CRM systems?",       "a": "Yes, Triotech integrates with Salesforce, Zoho, and HubSpot."     },     {       "q": "Do you support Hindi and English?",       "a": "Yes, all products are bilingual and support Hindi + English."     },     {       "q": "What is your pricing model?",       "a": "Pricing depends on team size and features. Our sales team will provide a custom quote."     },     {       "q": "How long does deployment take?",       "a": "Cloud deployment can be done in days, on-prem in a few weeks."     }   ],   "differentiators": [     "Cloud-native and scalable",     "AI-first with predictive analytics",     "Mobile-friendly design",     "Enterprise-grade security"   ] }

Ah, perfect!  So you're interested in Ringingo, our AI-powered dialer.  

Ringingo is designed for sales teams and telemarketers. It automates call handling, does smart call routing, and gives you real-time performance metrics.  It's a fantastic tool for boosting sales efficiency and improving lead generation.

Is there anything specific about Ringingo you'd like to know more about? Perhaps its integration capabilities, pricing, or a demo?
